Description.Name: Repaired Mechbay
Description.Details: Enables to Drop 1 additional Mech or Tank. The first cradle turned out alright, Boss. There's enough scrap left lying around we should be able to construct the bones of a gantry for the next, but we're also gonna need to buy several complex components to get the next cradle ready for use.

AssignedCastDescription: This will use up the last of the parts that weren't salvaged, but at least we were able to keep the costs down, right?
